title: The Darker Touch of Cane
description: Evelyn Ash just rejected Jonah Cane, and she's about to discover just how far he'll go to claim her heart. The problem is, Evelyn's struggling to believe he really loves her, and with a string of suspicious events making her wary, can she be sure that their whole relationship hasn't just been one big fantasy?  With Jonah's notorious uncle freed from prison, an ex-lover intent on winning Jonah back, and secrets that could change everything hanging between them, will Evelyn and Jonah overcome the odds and stay together? Or is their world about to fall irrevocably apart?
author: Lacey Alpha
